original_text: One of their own people will rule them as king. I will ask him to come near to me, and he will come near. Nobody would be brave enough to come near to me, unless I asked him to come.’ That is what the Lord says. One of their own people will rule them as king. I will ask him to come near to me, and he will come near. Nobody would be brave enough to come near to me, unless I asked him to come.’ That is what the Lord says. One of their own people will rule them as king.
korean_text: 그 영도자는 그들 중에서 나올 것이요 그 통치자도 그들 중에서 나오리라 내가 그를 가까이 오게 하리니 그가 내게 가까이 오리라 참으로 담대한 마음으로 내게 가까이 올 자가 누구냐 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: One of their own people will rule them as king.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중의 한 사람이 왕으로 그들을 다스릴 것이다.

sentences.original_text: I will ask him to come near to me,
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그에게 내게 가까이 오라고 요청할 것이고,

sentences.original_text: Nobody would be brave enough to come near to me,
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 내게 가까이 오려는 용기를 내지 못할 것이고,

sentences.original_text: unless I asked him to come.'
That is what the Lord says.
One of their own people will rule them as king.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중의 한 사람이 왕으로 그들을 다스릴 것이다.

sentences.original_text: I will ask him to come near to me,
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그에게 내게 가까이 오라고 요청할 것이고,

sentences.original_text: Nobody would be brave enough to come near to me,
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 내게 가까이 오려는 용기를 내지 못할 것이고,

sentences.original_text: unless I asked him to come.'
That is what the Lord says.
One of their own people will rule them as king.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중의 한 사람이 왕으로 그들을 다스릴 것이다.
